name: The Light (itch) (BiomeCo)
description:
The Light

This Game is basically a top-down-shooter created in Godot.  It has a real fast gameplay and you will probably not survive that long, but I thought that it'd be boring if I made slower gameplay. The game hasn't got any music yet because I'm not very good at composing, but maybe there will be added one later.

It is my first real Game so if you find some bugs or have ideas for improvement, just write in the comments and I will see if I can do it.

Yes, this game is created from a YouTube video (I will link it below). I made some changes, but still huge credit to

Eli Cuaycong

If you like the game, you can follow me, write a comment, a feedback or just enjoy it.
